languages.text: "Но я ошибалась". {n}Презрение отражается на лице эльдарки, когда вы вновь встречаетесь взглядами.{/n} "Подобно прочим мон-кай, ты относишься к моим собратьям с беспричинной ненавистью и жестокостью. Ты даже не попытал{mf|ся|ась} спасти их! Возможно... довериться тебе было ошибкой. Сейчас же я — словно заложница на твоем корабле, связанная долгом и безысходностью".

"But I was mistaken." {n}You see disdain in the Aeldari's face when you lock eyes again,{/n} "Like the other mon-keigh, you treat my kin with wanton hatred and cruelty. You did not even try to save them! Perhaps... trusting you was a mistake. Now I am like a hostage trapped on your ship, chained by debt and hopelessness."
languages.original_text: "Но я ошибалась". {n}Презрение отражается на лице эльдарки, когда вы вновь встречаетесь взглядами.{/n} "Подобно прочим мон-кай, ты относишься к моим собратьям с беспричинной ненавистью и жестокостью. Ты даже не попытал{mf|ся|ась} спасти их! Возможно... довериться тебе было ошибкой. Сейчас же я — словно заложница на твоем корабле, связанная долгом и безысходностью".

traits.locale_text: "But I was mistaken." {n}Disdain reflects in the Aeldari's face when you lock eyes again,{/n} "Like the other mon-keigh, you treat my kinsmen with unreasonable hatred and cruelty. You didn't even try to save them! Perhaps... trysting you was a mistake. Now I am like a hostage trapped on your ship, chained by debt and hopelessness."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But I was mistaken." {n}Disdain reflects in the Aeldari's face when you lock eyes again,{/n} "Like the other mon-keigh, you treat my kinsmen with unreasonable hatred and cruelty. You didn't even try to save them! Perhaps... trysting you was a mistake. Now I am like a hostage trapped on your ship, chained by debt and hopelessness."

You did not even try to save them! Perhaps... trusting you was a mistake. Now I am like a hostage trapped on your ship, chained by debt and hopelessness."

You did not even try to save them! Perhaps... trusting you was a mistake. Now I am like a hostage trapped on your ship, chained by debt and hopelessness."

traits.locale_text: "But I was mistaken." {n}You see disdain in the Aeldari's face when you lock eyes again,{/n} "Like the other mon-keigh, you treat my kin with wanton hatred and cruelty. You did not even try to save them! Perhaps... trusting you was a mistake. Now I am like a hostage trapped on your ship, chained by debt and hopelessness."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “但我错了。”{n}你与伊莉耶特四目相对，她毫不掩饰自己的轻蔑。{/n}“你和所有其他猴子一样，对我的族人也只有滔天的仇恨与凶残，你甚至从未想过要拯救他们！或许我真的看错了人。如今，我成了这艘飞船的人质，留给我的只有无穷的债务与绝望。”
languages.original_text: "But I was mistaken." {n}You see disdain in the Aeldari's face when you lock eyes again,{/n} "Like the other mon-keigh, you treat my kin with wanton hatred and cruelty. You did not even try to save them! Perhaps... trusting you was a mistake. Now I am like a hostage trapped on your ship, chained by debt and hopelessness."

traits.locale_text: “但我错了。”{n}你与伊莉耶特四目相对，她毫不掩饰自己的轻蔑。{/n}“你和所有其他猴子一样，对我的族人也只有滔天的仇恨与凶残，你甚至从未想过要拯救他们！或许我真的看错了人。如今，我成了这艘飞船的人质，留给我的只有无穷的债务与绝望。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Pero me equivocaba». {n}Ves el desdén en el rostro de la Aeldari cuando vuestras miradas se cruzan de nuevo.{/n} «Como todos los mon-keigh, tratas a los de mi especie con crueldad y odio indiscriminados. ¡Ni siquiera intentaste salvarlos! Tal vez... confiar en ti fuese un error. Ahora me siento como una rehén prisionera en tu nave, encadenada por la deuda y la desesperación».
languages.original_text: "But I was mistaken." {n}You see disdain in the Aeldari's face when you lock eyes again,{/n} "Like the other mon-keigh, you treat my kin with wanton hatred and cruelty. You did not even try to save them! Perhaps... trusting you was a mistake. Now I am like a hostage trapped on your ship, chained by debt and hopelessness."

traits.locale_text: «Pero me equivocaba». {n}Ves el desdén en el rostro de la Aeldari cuando vuestras miradas se cruzan de nuevo.{/n} «Como todos los mon-keigh, tratas a los de mi especie con crueldad y odio indiscriminados. ¡Ni siquiera intentaste salvarlos! Tal vez... confiar en ti fuese un error. Ahora me siento como una rehén prisionera en tu nave, encadenada por la deuda y la desesperación».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Mais j'avais tort. » {n}Quand vous croisez de nouveau le regard de l'Aeldari, vous y lisez du dédain.{/n} « Comme tous les autres mon-keigh, vous traitez mes semblables avec cruauté. Vous n'avez même pas essayé de les sauver ! Peut-être... que j'ai fait une erreur en vous accordant ma confiance. Désormais, je suis comme une otage sur ce vaisseau, enchaînée par mes dettes et mon désespoir. »
languages.original_text: "But I was mistaken." {n}You see disdain in the Aeldari's face when you lock eyes again,{/n} "Like the other mon-keigh, you treat my kin with wanton hatred and cruelty. You did not even try to save them! Perhaps... trusting you was a mistake. Now I am like a hostage trapped on your ship, chained by debt and hopelessness."

traits.locale_text: « Mais j'avais tort. » {n}Quand vous croisez de nouveau le regard de l'Aeldari, vous y lisez du dédain.{/n} « Comme tous les autres mon-keigh, vous traitez mes semblables avec cruauté. Vous n'avez même pas essayé de les sauver ! Peut-être... que j'ai fait une erreur en vous accordant ma confiance. Désormais, je suis comme une otage sur ce vaisseau, enchaînée par mes dettes et mon désespoir. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Aber das war ein Irrtum." {n}Die siehst Verachtung im Gesicht der Aeldari, als Euer Blick sich wieder trifft.{/n} "Wie die anderen Chem-Pan-Sey bringt Ihr den Meinen nichts als Hass und Grausamkeit entgegen. Ihr habt nicht einmal versucht, sie zu retten! Vielleicht ... Das es ein Fehler, Euch zu vertrauen. Jetzt bin ich praktisch eine Geisel auf Eurem Schiff, durch Schulden und Hoffnungslosigkeit in Ketten gelegt."
languages.original_text: "But I was mistaken." {n}You see disdain in the Aeldari's face when you lock eyes again,{/n} "Like the other mon-keigh, you treat my kin with wanton hatred and cruelty. You did not even try to save them! Perhaps... trusting you was a mistake. Now I am like a hostage trapped on your ship, chained by debt and hopelessness."

traits.locale_text: "Aber das war ein Irrtum." {n}Die siehst Verachtung im Gesicht der Aeldari, als Euer Blick sich wieder trifft.{/n} "Wie die anderen Chem-Pan-Sey bringt Ihr den Meinen nichts als Hass und Grausamkeit entgegen. Ihr habt nicht einmal versucht, sie zu retten! Vielleicht ... Das es ein Fehler, Euch zu vertrauen. Jetzt bin ich praktisch eine Geisel auf Eurem Schiff, durch Schulden und Hoffnungslosigkeit in Ketten gelegt."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「だが、我は思い違いをしていた」{n}あなたが再び目を合わせた時、アエルダリの顔に軽蔑の色が見えた。{/n}「他のモン＝ケイのように、お前は我が同族を無謀な憎悪と残酷さで扱っている。お前は彼らを救おうともしなかった！きっと…我がお前を信用したのは間違いだったのだろう。今、我はお前の船に囚われた人質のようなもの…負債と絶望の鎖でつながれている」
languages.original_text: "But I was mistaken." {n}You see disdain in the Aeldari's face when you lock eyes again,{/n} "Like the other mon-keigh, you treat my kin with wanton hatred and cruelty. You did not even try to save them! Perhaps... trusting you was a mistake. Now I am like a hostage trapped on your ship, chained by debt and hopelessness."

traits.locale_text: 「だが、我は思い違いをしていた」{n}あなたが再び目を合わせた時、アエルダリの顔に軽蔑の色が見えた。{/n}「他のモン＝ケイのように、お前は我が同族を無謀な憎悪と残酷さで扱っている。お前は彼らを救おうともしなかった！きっと…我がお前を信用したのは間違いだったのだろう。今、我はお前の船に囚われた人質のようなもの…負債と絶望の鎖でつながれている」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Fakat yanılmışım." {n}Yeniden göz göze geldiğinizde Aeldari'nin yüzündeki kibri görüyorsun.{/n} "Diğer mon-keighler gibi sen de soyuma karşı nedensiz bir nefret ve zalimlikle yaklaşıyorsun. Onları kurtarmaya çalışmadın bile! Belki de sana güvenmekle hata etmişimdir. Şimdi geminde tıkılıp kalmış bir esir gibiyim, borç ve umutsuzlukla zincirliyim."
languages.original_text: "But I was mistaken." {n}You see disdain in the Aeldari's face when you lock eyes again,{/n} "Like the other mon-keigh, you treat my kin with wanton hatred and cruelty. You did not even try to save them! Perhaps... trusting you was a mistake. Now I am like a hostage trapped on your ship, chained by debt and hopelessness."

traits.locale_text: "Fakat yanılmışım." {n}Yeniden göz göze geldiğinizde Aeldari'nin yüzünde kibir görüyorsun.{/n} "Diğer mon-keighler gibi sen de benim soyuma karşı nedensiz bir nefret ve zalimlikle yaklaşıyorsun. Onları kurtarmaya çalışmadın bile! Belki de sana güvenmekle hata etmişimdir. Şimdi geminde tıkılıp kalmış bir esir gibiyim, borç ve umutsuzlukla zincirlenmişim."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
